AddHours.Description: The function is used to add hours to 'Datetime' datatype
AddHours.Name: AddHours

AddMinutes.Description: The function is used to add minutes to 'Datetime' datatype
AddMinutes.Name: AddMinutes

AddSeconds.Description: The function is used to add seconds to 'Datetime' datatype
AddSeconds.Name: AddSeconds

HourOfDay.Description: This function is extract the hours from datetime.
HourOfDay.Name: HourOfDay

MilliSecondOfDay.Description: This function is extract the milliseconds from datetime.
MilliSecondOfDay.Name: MilliSecondOfDay

MinuteOfDay.Description: This function is extract the minutes from datetime.
MinuteOfDay.Name: MinuteOfDay

SecondOfDay.Description: This function is extract the seconds from datetime.
SecondOfDay.Name: SecondOfDay

SubHours.Description: The function is used to subtract hours from 'Datetime' datatype
SubHours.Name: SubHours

SubMinutes.Description: The function is used to subtract minutes from 'Datetime' datatype
SubMinutes.Name: SubMinutes

SubSeconds.Description: The function is used to subtract seconds to 'Datetime' datatype
SubSeconds.Name: SubSeconds

Time.Description: The function $$time is used to convert a time specified in string format into the 'Time' data type.This is mainly required when a string contains a time on which manipulations are to be performed treating it as a time format eg: filtering the data based on the time comparison.TDL allows Addition or substraction of a number to a time type field and in turn it will return a time type field.
Time.Name: Time
